      • getLineNumber

        public int getLineNumber()
        Gets the line number where the exception occurred.

        The first line is line 1.

        Returns:
        An integer representing the line number, or -1 if none is available.

      • getColumnNumber

        public int getColumnNumber()
        Gets the column number where the exception occurred.

        The first column is column 1.

        Returns:
        An integer representing the column number, or -1 if none is available.

      • getURI

        public java.util.Optional<java.net.URI> getURI()
        Gets the URI where the message applies. If this value is not set, the message applies to the primary file (the validator input). The URI may be absolute or relative to the primary file.
        Returns:
        returns the URI
